name: An Even Darker Dungeon
description:
This little mage has been locked in a pitch black dungeon and is looking for a way out, can you help him?

Hidden in the shadows are the keys you'll need to unlock the doors... Go too slow and you'll run out of time and get caught, but tread carefully or you might fall into a sinkhole.

Game made with Unity in circa 3.5 hours for the Trijam #123, theme "Hide or Get Caught".

Controls

W, A, S, D - move

LMB - spawn fireball

Suggested Resolution 16:9

All the assets were made for this gamejam, except for music and SFX, which can be found here: https://joelsteudler.itch.io/8-bit-action-music-sfx , https://joelsteudler.itch.io/retro-fantasy-music-pack-vol-1

Download Instructions

Step1. Download and unzip the file.

Step2. Open the folder and double click the exe file called "An Even Darker Dungeon".

Step3. Play.

What do I need to play the game:

Windows, you do not need any other software.
